replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
1  oreexcavation integration
需要 oreexcavation
2 tinker i/o
需要 redstoneflux 2.0.1.2（含）以上
3 inprovable skills
需要 hommercore 2.0.5.0（含）以上

replies.author: NothingnessVoid
replies.txt_content: 你缺少如图所示的三个mod 建议去mcmod搜索这几个英文名字
